item.title: Report X-2024051140
item.description:
Report X-2024051140

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-05T15:12:36+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-14
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY, WE RESPONDED TO A DECLARED LEAKING DANGEROUS GOODS PACKAGE. THE PACKAGE HAS AN APPROPRIATE IATA SHIPPERS DECLARATION, CAO LABEL, FLAMMABLE DIAMOND LABEL AND MARKING OF UN1263 PAINT. THE PACKAGE HAD SUCCESSFULLY PASSED AN ACCEPTANCE AUDIT AT THE ORIGIN FACILITY IN NEVADA. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED FOUR X ONE GALLON PAILS OF PAINT WITH TWO LEAKING FROM THE BOTTOM SEAM OF THE PAILS.

item.title: Report X-2024050932
item.description:
Report X-2024050932

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-03T15:13:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-15
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A LEAKING DANGEROUS GOODS PACKAGE THAT WAS MARKED AND LABELED AS CONSUMER COMMODITY ID8000 WITH A CLASS 9 DIAMOND LABEL, AIR LIMITED QUANTITY MARKING, AND SHIPPERS DECLARATION. THE DANGEROUS GOODS PACKAGE HAD PREVIOUSLY PASSED AN ACCEPTANCE AUDIT AT THE ORIGIN FACILITY. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED ONE X 200 ML AEROSOL CAN OF RITUALS FOAMING SHOWER GEL THAT WAS LEAKING FROM THE CLOSURE. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM THE NETHERLANDS GOING TO THE USA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER B567JO, ARVATO BENELUX BV, BREM 1, HEIJEN NETHERLANDS 6598MH.

item.title: Report I-2024050069
item.description:
Report I-2024050069

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-30T18:16:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-21
  • City: Erlanger
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 05/21/2024 this shipment had hidden dangerous goods that were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the at the DHL CVG hub, 236 Wendell H Ford Blvd Erlanger, KY 41018. Transportation by road has been confirmed. Repeat offender-- This shipper continues to ship dangerous goods without proper preparation in accordance with IATA regulations, despite being rejected on multiple occasions.
